1122.content:
Ichigo landed on all fours like her gene doner, the Irimote Mountain Cat, then collapsed to the ground in pain, clutching her stomach, wailing like a cat, ears folded down. She was half expecting blood and guts to come gushing out, but apparently the spikey thing was not that big or sharp, and it had fallen out during her fall. She then realized something.

"Wait, why hasn't it attacked me again?" Ichigo said, confused. She looked up, fearing that the Chimera Anima was right in front of her, but it was quite the opposite, in fact. It was beating a hasty retreat. It looked like a Hedgehog, and it probably had been before the parasite had gotten a hold of it. Poor thing.

"......what?......okay?" Ichigo said, confused. In her confusion, she didn't notice the slight feeling of tightness around her waist, arms, chest and thighs. She had some ideas of what to do next, and they were simple. Chase after it, give up and go back to the cafe, or........go and explore.
1122.title: she slowly began to gain

1123.content:
When she got stabbed she didn't know it but she had been infused with weight gain parasites.

After she defeated the monster she returned to her home. "hmm... " she thought "I'm kind of hungry". While she trying to figure out why she was hungry, she didn't realize that she had started to eat. After a while of thinking she was full. "Hmmm It must have been nothing" she thought while she walked up stairs. It was very late and Ichigo was very tired from fighting all day.
While she slept she didn't feel her stomach expanding larger and larger every minute. The parasites also had a side effect, while ichigo gained weight everybody would not notice it and ichigo wouldn't either.
The next morning she woke up and was very hungry so she rushed down stairs to find their was tons of food waiting for her to eat. While she ate the parasites got larger and larger. She had finished all of the food when she realized that she would have to stop soon before she gained weight, already happened, and wasn't late to work. She tried to stop but the food tasted sooo good and it just kept coming out of nowhere.After hours of eating she realized she was late to work. As she rushed to get up she was stuck. "Hmmmm" she said "Wait today is Saturday, Lettuce and Mint will cover for me the shop is never busy today". As she kept eating she was actually asleep dreaming of eating large amounts of foods. The parasites had drugged her and were making sure their leader would not be defeated. Ichigo only woke up for a split second to realize her work situation, then went back to sleep. When she woke up she went to go change her clothes because she had streched them to the limit. While she walked up stairs she was thinking that her clothes had shrunk in the wash. While she went through her closet she found clothes that....
1123.title: nothing happend

152.content:
Sunday in Japan. Most teens would be enjoying the day off or studying for tests. Not for Fujiwara Zakuro, who was instead currently in her alter ego, Mew Zakuro, hunting down an Anima Chimera. This particular one had been a recent thorn in the Mew’s sides, and Zakuro was taking measures to get rid of it as to make sure it didn’t ruin a critical momment of her life......and the other’s lives as well. Some would say that’s she’s being reckless or stupid. But, that was how she dealt with problems; by savagely beating them in the mind or in the face.

Currently, she was hunting the Chimera in.......
152.title: On The Hunt
